DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate impact three-year Healthy Futures program teen sexual behavior three Massachusetts city .
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate impact three-year Healthy Futures program teen sexual behavior three Massachusetts city . This longitudinal school-cluster randomize control trial include 15 public middle school ( n=1,344 ) . Participants enrol 6th grade 2011-2012 school year ( Cohort 1 ) 2012-2013 school year ( Cohort 2 ) . Outcome data source include five student survey : baseline ; 6th , 7th , 8th grade follow-up ; 9th grade follow-up ( Cohort 1 ) .
DOC.criteria: Students attend one 15 participate public middle school Students enrol 6th grade 20112012 school year ( Cohort 1 ) 20122013 school year ( Cohort 2 ) Students withdraw Healthy Futures program participation himself/herself , parent , school administrator ( ) prior consent/assent process study Students 6th grade time consent Students school consent/assent process occur Students withdraw Healthy Futures program participation himself/herself , parent , school administrator ( ) prior consent/assent process study .
